main event: A bright metallic object was observed in the sky in Mount Kisco, New York in February 1960, moving steadily before disappearing from sight.
interesting points: The object appeared to be cigar-shaped and emitted a humming sound,The sighting lasted for about 20 seconds,It was at an altitude of about 10 degrees from the horizon,The witnesses were actively looking for aircraft as the object was near a planned air route,Conclusions suggested that the object might be an aircraft or astronomical object.
